Key Arguments: The bill contravenes the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights.
The government and media should not be the sole arbiters of truth.
The government and legacy media have historically spread misinformation and disinformation.
Opposing views have been silenced, leading to negative consequences for individuals.
The bill would erode individual rights and create a totalitarian government.
Notable Quotes: To allow our Government and media to be the one source of truth will create a dystopian nightmare.
This Bill would see the erosion of the rights of the individual and in doing so create an authoritative governing body with powers that will reach into every aspect of individual and collective life.
